a.title: FHSD AMI Communication Updates and Translations

div.a: FHSD AMI Communication Updates and Translations

nav.div: Francis Howell School District » Departments/Programs » Health and Wellness » FHSD Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates and Resources » Alternative Methods of Instruction (AMI)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: In the Francis Howell School District, the health and wellness of students, staff, and our valued community patrons is our top priority. Like most schools and organizations around the country, FHSD will follow the

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: guidelines to prevent or contain the further spread of coronavirus. The District strives to actively educate students and staff on preventative measures to limit the transmission and spread of coronavirus. In addition, FHSD custodial and maintenance staff are working diligently to keep our schools clean.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: In addition to caring for health and wellness, FHSD has taken steps to ensure that learning continues during a closure. If the District closes a school building or multiple buildings in response to coronavirus, teachers will make instructional resources available to their students using the links below.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

strong.span: To access your student’s instructional materials:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

li.span: Start by selecting your student’s school.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

li.span: For elementary students, select their grade level.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

li.span: For middle and high school students, select their teachers’ names

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;

strong.span: If you don’t know your student’s schedule, please access the Parent Portal here:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;
